labels.name: Hosting
labels.description: Type of infrastructure the Stake Pool is running on, eg. Cloud, Bare Metal, Mix

subcategories.name: Cloud
subcategories.description: Stake Pool is entirely running in the Cloud

subcategories.name: Bare Metal
subcategories.description: Stake Pool is entirely running on Bare Metal

subcategories.name: Mix
subcategories.description: Stake Pool is hosted on a combination of Cloud and Bare Metal resources

labels.name: Charity
labels.description: Charity organizations. Subcategories are based on the following breakdown: https://topnonprofits.com/types-of-charities/

subcategories.name: Animals
subcategories.description: Charity organizations focused on Wildlife conservation organizations, Pet and Animal Welfare Organizations, Hunting & Fishing Conservation Groups, Zoos and Aquariums.

subcategories.name: Environmental
subcategories.description: Environmental Charities focus on ways to promote preservation, appreciation, and sustainable development for the environment.

subcategories.name: Non-governmental organizations
subcategories.description: Charity organizations focused on International Development NGOs, Disaster Relief & Humanitarian NGOs, Peace & Human Rights NGOs, Conservation NGOs, Child Sponsorship Organizations

subcategories.name: Health
subcategories.description: Charity organizations focused on Disease & Disorder, Medical Services & Treatment, Medical Research Charities, Patient and Family Support Charities

subcategories.name: Education
subcategories.description: Charity organizations focused on support students from every age group. Some serve as the educational institutions while focus on making education more accessible and effective.

subcategories.name: Arts & Culture
subcategories.description: Charity organizations focused on supporting Museums & Art Galleries, Performing Arts, Libraries & Historical Societies, Public Broadcasting and Media

labels.name: ITN
labels.description: Stake Pool that was part of the Incentivized Test Net

labels.name: Contributor (Builder)
labels.description: Stake Pool run by Cardano builders. Eg. Software, Infrastructure

labels.name: Women in Blockchain
labels.description: Stake Pool run by a woman

labels.name: Education
labels.description: Stake Pool run by someone whose main focus is to create blockchain educational content

labels.name: Content creator
labels.description: Stake Pool run by a content creator. Eg YouTuber, TikToker.

labels.name: (Fair) Initial Stakepool Offering
labels.description: Stake Pool part of an ISO/FISO
